meanings.definition: A device used to capture sound waves and convert them into electrical signals.
meanings.sent1: The microphones in the studio picked up every sound clearly.
meanings.sent2: We need to buy new microphones for the conference room.
meanings.sent3: The microphones at the concert were so sensitive, they even caught the audience whispering.
meanings.sent4: Her ears were like microphones, capturing every detail of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The microphones stood tall, ready to capture the magic of the performance.
